DataElement.preferredName: Toronto Extremity Salvage Score, Upper Extremity Activity Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' comments regarding any activities that they find difficult to perform or on any other difficulties they experienced due to the problem they currently have in their arm that they feel are important and have not been asked about in this questionnaire.
